DOC.brief_summary: Despite widespread use , extensive study , optimal route administration misoprostol surgical abortion remain define . Following administration 400 mcg vaginally per clinical guideline , time optimal priming seem 3 hour , long interval great risk bleed expulsion uterine content surgical evacuation . Sublingual administration seem give adequate plasma concentration cervical priming faster oral vaginal administration . This may allow short wait time maintain efficacy , less side effect logistic advantage .
DOC.brief_title: Misoprostol Cervical Priming Prior Vacuum Aspiration
